title: Meta readies AR glasses reveal at Connect event
description: Meta is set to unveil its first augmented reality glasses and announce updates to its virtual reality and AI products at its annual Connect conference. The AR glasses, initially for internal use, are expected to be commercially available by 2027. Meta's investment in these technologies has significantly increased its capital expenses.
content: Facebook owner Meta prepared on Wednesday to kick off its annual Connect conference at its California headquarters, where it is expected to preview its first augmented reality glasses and announce updates to its existing virtual reality and artificial intelligence products.
